description:
Nice, modern and clean compared with Korganizer. Works very well with my google calender as well. I only wish there was an option in the future to place Sunday at the beginning of the work week.

Works well with Kubuntu 24.04, Plasma 5.27.11

5/22/24 - Is not a Sunday.
This calendar is worthless.
I added my google account and tried to change every available setting with no luck. None of my calendar events showing up here.
